review.title: “had a good time working at imate”
review.pros: Pros – amazing colleagues. had a very good time working there just because of the people working around me although the management was disorganised.
review.cons: Cons – bad management, communication among different levels of management was really poor and lacking responsible decision making
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – improve people management

review.title: “Avoid i-Mate and CEO Morrison at all costs! Totally without scruples.”
review.pros: Pros – It provides a paycheck. Other than that, working with Windows Mobile and handsets is interesting work. Benefits were decent.
review.cons: Cons – The company is run like a hobby by the CEO. As a company, they have no integrity in dealing with their customers; no dedication to producing a quality product. I firmly believe that their business model consists of sell once to a customer, and drop support immediately folling the sale. The work environment was extremely unpleasant and unprofessional, with the CEO and senior manager ruling by threat and intimiation.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Treat your employees as partners in trying to make the company successful. Get a "real" business manager to act as President. Someone who actually has a business degree and relavent profession background.
